product_name: Marmot Reactor Half-Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Moving fast yet still need a lightweight layer for warmth? Pull on the men's Marmot Reactor Half-Zip Fleece Jacket made with Polartec(R). Polartec(R) Classic 100 microfleece is lightweight and breathable, perfect for trail running, backpacking and biking. Zippered arm pocket is bonded for strength. 12 in. center front zipper offers easy on/off and venting. Elastic-bound cuffs seal in warmth. Marmot Reactor Fleece Hoodie Jacket for men features flatlock seams that won't irritate skin. Closeout.
short_description: Moving fast yet still need a lightweight layer for warmth? Pull on the men's Marmot Reactor Half-Zip Fleece Jacket made with Polartec(R).
